title: Preparing the Federal Response to Advanced Technologies
descriptions: As artificial intelligence has advanced rapidly in recent years, debate has expanded about its potential risks, with the relationship to biosecurity being a particular concern. How can the U.S. government respond to emerging threats posed by broadly capable AI systems?

image.desc: A green and black digital biohazad symbol, photo by alengo/Getty Images

content.descriptions: Testimony presented before the U.S. Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs, Subcommittee on Emerging Threats and Spending Oversight on September 19, 2023.
